app_description: Translate Voice Translator AI App Fast voice and text translation worldwide. Want to travel abroad Trying to start learning a new language or upskilling Want a language teacher ready to teach Don t worry enjoy the most accurate Translate Voice Translator AI GREAT CHOICE FOR TRANSLATION! Supports all popular languages. Users can effectively communicate with people who speak different languages without the need for interpreters or language specialists around. Express yourself as if you were a native speaker! Moreover you can order food ask for directions or speak to a professional customer. Chat with anyone anywhere. Turn your smartphone into your personal multilingual translator! KEY FEATURE Voice to Voice: Communicate with each other in two way native language in real time. Text to Text: Translate entire text accurately and easily with advanced support for grammar and context. Voice to Text: Speak and translate into text based translation. Hands free approach when busy working. Text to Voice: Instantly convert voice from typed text. The translator supports the following 100 languages: English French Spanish Arabic Chinese Portuguese Urdu German Hindi Indonesian Vietnamese Malay Italian Japanese Korean Thai Turkish etc. ....with more languages supported! USER MANUAL: Select language you want to translate Enter text or tap the voice button Get high quality translations Everything is done on one screen! ADVANCED FEATURES: Record and save your translations to use whenever you need. Easily share translations. PREMIUM REGISTRATION: Download to use with 3 day free trial grants access to all pro features. Surely there will be attractive special features waiting for you. No commitment. Cancel anytime. It is the first choice for users who want a reliable and efficient translation application on their IOS devices. All you need to do is download the Translate Voice Translator AI App Translator Expert in seconds with this translator.
